constraints.name: monotonic_decrease
constraints.description: 箭在穿过气球后高度递减（每次穿过一个气球，高度减少1）
constraints.formal: H' = H - 1, where H is the current height and H' is the new height after popping a balloon

constraints.name: distinct_positions
constraints.description: 每个气球的位置是唯一的，且从左到右编号
constraints.formal: position(i) != position(j) for all i != j

constraints.name: min_arrows
constraints.description: 需要找到最少的箭数来射穿所有气球
constraints.formal: minimize |arrows| such that all balloons are popped
